english.segment1: God is a present. Help in time of trouble. He will lift this up. And he will always make a way
english.segment2: Tell me what you see when I pass by. Shut up a . line in the sky. Am I getting you to . or am I getting you by. All I can take is one step at the time
english.segment3: Chorus. Look at me. Im trying. Every day .. Make mistakes. Keep that .. Try again .. See me
english.segment5: Some people see walking takes too long
english.segment6: But I say with walking you cant go wrong. Why should you rush away trough life?. You wont get there if youre running all the time
english.segment7: Chorus. Why does my life say . up all on me. Cant anyone see. Does it show I rock with the greatest?. I cant get back the time I spent. Use the rest of it to show the other world how I made it
